mapper.sql:
seq , delNy , partyType
, (SELECT cdName FROM teamCode AS cd WHERE 1=1 AND cd.cdSeq = p.partySport) AS partySport , partyName , playerNum , playerMax , playDt , playTimeStart , playTimeEnd , partyLeader , partyDesc , toolNy , partyGen , partyAge , madeTime , partyLocation
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM party WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0

SELECT seq , delNy , partyType , partySport , partyName , playerNum , playerMax , playDt , playTimeStart , playTimeEnd , partyLeader , partyDesc , toolNy , partyGen , partyAge , madeTime , partyLocation FROM party WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} AND partySport = #{partySport} AND partyName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{partyName},'%') AND playDt = #{playDt} AND partyGen = #{partyGen} AND partyAge = #{partyAge} AND partyLocation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{partyLocation},'%')

SELECT mpSeq , (SELECT cd.cdName FROM teamCode cd WHERE 1=1 AND cd.cdSeq = mp.nowStatus ) nowStatus , (SELECT m.nickname FROM member m WHERE 1=1 AND m.seq = mp.myName ) myName , (SELECT mm.nickname FROM member mm WHERE 1=1 AND mm.seq = mp.leaderName ) leaderName , (SELECT p.partyName FROM party p WHERE 1=1 AND p.seq = mp.mpName ) ptName , mp.mpName , mp.mpDelNy , mp.updtDt FROM myParty mp LEFT JOIN teamCode cd ON cd.cdSeq = mp.nowStatus LEFT JOIN member m ON m.seq = mp.myName AND mp.leaderName LEFT JOIN party p ON p.seq = mp.mpName WHERE 1=1 AND myName = #{myName}
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET delNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}

SET @mpCount = (SELECT COUNT(mp.mpSeq) mpCount FROM myParty mp LEFT JOIN party p ON p.seq = mp.mpName WHERE 1=1 AND mp.mpName = #{mpName} AND mp.nowStatus = #{nowStatus})
UPDATE party p SET playerNum = @mpCount + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND p.seq = #{mpName}
